Privacy Policy and Legal Statement McKinley is committed to respecting and protecting your privacy. We provide certain services and opportunities for users of our Web site.
In order to provide services to you and to develop a better site, we may ask you to submit some personal information. Please read the following to learn more.

SECTION.SUBTITLE: Personal Information Collected
SECTION.SUBTEXT:
We collect information:
When you register an account to apply for housing online at http://www.mckinley.com/apply. This includes your email address and password. When you complete an online application (http://www.mckinley.com/apply) for housing we require personal information in order to conduct a full background and credit check. This includes your full name, date of birth, current address, ssn, phone number, email, emergency contact information, current and past housing information, and current and past employment information. When you submit a request for more information about our communities, we collect your name, phone, and email.

SECTION.SUBTITLE: Uses of personal information
SECTION.SUBTEXT:
The information you provide us on http://www.mckinley.com/apply, with your authorization (via electronic signature) is used to conduct a full background and credit check for housing at our communities. By sending a request for more information, we use this information to contact you to find the best housing solution. We use the information you provide us to administer your account for technical issues.
We do not sell, rent, or otherwise provide personally identifiable information to third parties without your consent except where it is necessary to carry out your instructions (to conduct background and/or credit checks for example).
To modify or delete this personal information or opt-out, please send an email to live@mckinley.com with your request.

SECTION.SUBTITLE: Information Gathered
SECTION.SUBTEXT: When you request information or complete a contact form, McKinley is collecting information from you. This information is necessary to tailor our subsequent communications with you, to fulfill your information request and to contact you about McKinley.

SECTION.SUBTITLE: Information Sharing
SECTION.SUBTEXT: McKinley will not sell, rent, or share your personal information with others, unless we have your permission or are required by law. We will not share aggregate data with other parties.

SECTION.SUBTITLE: Cookies
SECTION.SUBTEXT:
A cookie is a small data file that certain websites write to your hard drive when you visit them. A cookie file can contain information such as a user ID that the site uses to track the pages you've visited, but the only personal information a cookie can contain is information you supply yourself. A cookie can't read data off your hard disk or read cookie files created by other sites.
McKinley may use cookies to identify what pages are being used and which ones aren't. This helps us analyze the website traffic and improve our site. No other company has access to McKinley's cookies.
McKinley wants to be sure you understand that accepting a cookie in no way gives us access to your computer or any personal information about you, other than the data you chose to share with us. If you are uncomfortable with cookie technology, you may adjust your browser accordingly.

SECTION.SUBTITLE: Changes to this Privacy Policy
SECTION.SUBTEXT: McKinley may amend this policy occasionally. If we make any substantial changes in the way we use your personal information, we will notify you.

SECTION.SUBTITLE: Feedback
